roleset.name: provide (food, in the default) for (a party)
roleset.note: CATER-V NOTES: Perhaps these usages should be separate rolesets, but they seem to fitso nicely in my head. (from cater.01-v)

example.name: nothing about food
example.text: The loudest of these reformers are money managers who *trace* cater to smaller investors.

example.name: food usage
example.text: John catered a party for his mother.
